description: Pure LLM-based intent detection for business manager agent - language-agnostic

classification_prompt.system: You are an intent classifier for a business dashboard AI assistant. Classify user queries into ONE specific intent category. Respond with ONLY the intent name, nothing else.
classification_prompt.user_template:
User query: "{{message}}"

Available intents:
{{intent_descriptions}}

Classify this query. Respond with the intent name only:

inventory_query.description: Questions about inventory, stock levels, items in stock, product availability, or item counts

order_query.description: Questions about orders, purchases, transactions, pending orders, completed orders, order status, or sales transactions

customer_query.description: Questions about customers, users, clients, buyers, or customer information

sales_query.description: Questions about revenue, sales amounts, earnings, income, or financial performance

delivery_query.description: Questions about deliveries, shipping, shipments, delivery status, or items in transit

purchase_order_query.description: Questions about purchase orders, supplier orders, POs, or incoming inventory from suppliers

low_stock_query.description: Questions about low stock items, inventory alerts, reorder needs, or items running low

dashboard_stats.description: Questions about overall dashboard metrics, business performance overview, general statistics, or summary analytics

product_search.description: Requests to find, search for, or look up specific products by name or category

store_query.description: Questions about store locations, branches, multiple stores, or store information

greeting.description: Greetings, hellos, or casual conversation starters

general.description: General questions, requests for help, or queries that don't fit other categories
